pages.text: 21|58|Pas [dar ƣijoʙi ʙutparaston] hamai onhoro ʙa cuz [ʙuti] ʙuzurgason ʙiskast, sojad, ʙa suroƣi on ʙiravand [to haqoiqro ʙarojason ʙozgu kunad]
21|59|[Vaqte onon ʙutxonaro cunin didand] Guftand: “Ci kase ʙo ma'ʙudoni mo cunin kardaast? Hatman, u sitamgor ast”
21|60|[Barxe] Guftand: “Mo sunidem cavone, ki uro Iʙrohim megujand, az onho [ʙa ʙadi] jod mekunad”
21|61|Guftand: “Pas uro dar ʙaroʙari didagoni mardum ʙijovared, ʙosad, ki [ʙar e'tirofas ʙa gunoh] guvoh ʙosand”
21|62|[Vaqte Iʙrohimro ovardand] Guftand: “Ej Iʙrohim, ojo tu in [kor] -ro ʙo ma'ʙudoni mo kardai?”
21|63|U guft: “Balki [ʙuti] ʙuzurgason cunin kardaast. Agar suxan megujand, az onho ʙipursed»
21|64|On goh [onon] ʙa xud omadand va [ʙa jakdigar] guftand: “Voqean, sumo [musriku] sitamgored”
21|65|Sipas [ʙoz ham] sar ʙa dusmani va inkor ʙardostand [va guftand] “Tu xuʙ medoni, ki inho suxan namegujand”
21|66|[Iʙrohim] guft: “Ojo ʙa coji Alloh taolo cizhoero meparasted, ki na sude ʙarojaton dorad va na zijone ʙa sumo merasonad
21|67|Voj ʙar sumo va ʙar on ci ʙa coji Alloh taolo meparasted! Ojo nameandesed?”
21|68|Onon guftand: “Agar mexohed [ʙaroi mucozotas] kore kuned, uro ʙisuzoned va ma'ʙudonatonro jori dihed”
21|69|[Sarancom uro dar otas andoxtand, vale Mo] Guftem: “Ej otas, ʙar Iʙrohim sard va salomat ʙos”
21|70|Va xostand ʙaroi [noʙudii u najrange ʙa kor ʙarand, vale Mo ononro zijonkortarin [mardum] soxtem
21|71|Va u va Lutro [ʙo hicrat] ʙa sarzamine, ki ʙaroi cahonijon dar on ʙarakat nihodaem [Som], nacot dodem
21|72|Va Ishoq va [navaas] Ja'quʙro [niz ʙa unvoni ʙaxsis] afzuni ʙa u ʙaxsidem va hamagiasonro [afrode] soista gardonidem
